name: Criteo S.A.
description: Criteo S.A. is a global technology company that specializes in digital advertising and marketing solutions. Founded in 2005 and headquartered in Paris, France, Criteo provides a performance marketing platform that allows businesses to reach their target audiences effectively through personalized ads across various digital channels. The company's technology leverages data and machine learning to deliver tailored advertising experiences that drive engagement and conversions. Criteo's services include retargeting, display advertising, and customer acquisition, helping brands to maximize their return on investment (ROI) in the digital space. With a mission to empower brands to connect with consumers in meaningful ways, Criteo has established itself as a leader in the ad tech industry, serving thousands of clients worldwide, including major retailers and e-commerce platforms. The company emphasizes transparency and trust in its operations, presenting clear reporting and analytics to ensure clients understand their advertising performance. In recent years, Criteo has expanded its offerings to include solutions for app advertising and audience targeting, adapting to the evolving digital landscape and consumer behavior.
